item.title: Farshid Varno
item.description: Intro I am a Machine Learning Eng. & Researcher with a strong technical background in HW & SW co-design. I’m a team player who strives building new technologies. In summary I am: The creator of FedSim Simulator The first inventor of an international patent on Transfer Learning A reviewer for top ML conferences like ECCV, CVPR, and ICCV A Doctoral Candidate at Dalhousie University and I have: 4+ years experience as Research Scientist (industrial) 1+ years experience as Data Scientist and Research Assistant (academic & industrial) 2 years experience as FPGA Engineer/RTL Designer (industrial) Experience Research & Industry Consultant, ML Engineer, Varnio Tech.
